definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Do you think that politician is on the up-and-up?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得那位政客的所作所为是否光明磊落？

sentences.english: The manager disavowed any knowledge of my actions.
sentences.chinese: 经理否认知道我的所作所为。

sentences.english: Shouldn’t I be punished for what I have done?
sentences.chinese: 我难道不该为我的所作所为得到应有的惩罚么？

sentences.english: Does this mean Fido is into dominance and submission?
sentences.chinese: 这就意味着大黄所作所为是统治与服从的表现么？

sentences.english: And so we ask ourselves. Will our actions echo across the centuries ?
sentences.chinese: 于是我们问自己，我们所作所为是否会千古留名？

sentences.english: He now has a long time to reflect on what he has done.
sentences.chinese: 现在他有很长的一段时间来反省他的所作所为。

sentences.english: He evinced great sorrow for what he had done.
sentences.chinese: 他对自己的所作所为深表痛心。

sentences.english: His words don't agree with his action.
sentences.chinese: 他的所作所为与他的言行不一致。

sentences.english: Just like a runing America did in the early 20th century????
sentences.chinese: 类似20世纪处崛起中美国的所作所为？

sentences.english: A warrior doesn't gives up what he loves. He finds the love in what he does.
sentences.chinese: 战士不会放弃他热衷的志业，他在所作所为中找到爱。

sentences.english: Two people find Han Zhiming, will reveal to the public the doings of the.
sentences.chinese: 二人找到韩志明，将其的所作所为公之于众。

sentences.english: She said she hadn't carried out her work expecting such recognition.
sentences.chinese: 博韦说没有预想自己的所作所为会得到这样的认可。

sentences.english: They realize acutely what the Japanese have done in Manchuria and Shantung .
sentences.chinese: 他们清醒地知道日本人在满洲里和山东的所作所为。

sentences.english: The road to Hell is paved with good intentions.
sentences.chinese: 用心良好没有实益，所作所为的结果最为重要。

sentences.english: After you sobered up , you would be ashamed of what you did .
sentences.chinese: 你醒酒之后，会为你的所作所为而感到羞愧。

sentences.english: As you can tell, I’m not a member of the ‘bra-burning’ brigade.
sentences.chinese: 当然我并不支持“烧掉胸罩”这一派的所作所为。

definition: words and actions/what one says and what one does
bad record (esp. of a public official)/unsavory track record
to shield (a miscreant) from punishment, criticism etc/to take sb's side
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
breaking faith and abandoning right (idiom); to betray/treachery/perfidy
